Interface WaitlistDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
WaitlistDAOImpl
public interface WaitlistDAO
Data Access Object interface for managing waitlist-related persistent data. Handles adding users to slots that are full and promoting them when space becomes available.
Author:
team IOTA

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addToWaitlist(Waitlist waitlist)
    Adds a user to the waitlist for a specific slot.
    Waitlist
    getWaitlistById(int waitlistId)
    Retrieves a single waitlist entry by its ID.
    List<Waitlist>

    Retrieves all waitlist entries for a specific slot, ordered by priority.

  • Method Details

    • addToWaitlist

      boolean addToWaitlist(Waitlist waitlist)
      Adds a user to the waitlist for a specific slot.
      Parameters:
      waitlist - the Waitlist object containing user and slot details
      Returns:
      true if successfully added

    • removeFromWaitlist

      boolean removeFromWaitlist(int waitlistId)
      Removes an entry from the waitlist after promotion or cancellation.
      Parameters:
      waitlistId - the unique persistent ID of the waitlist entry
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful

    • getWaitlistBySlot

      List<Waitlist> getWaitlistBySlot(int slotId)
      Retrieves all waitlist entries for a specific slot, ordered by priority.
      Parameters:
      slotId - the unique slot ID
      Returns:
      an ordered list of waitlist participants

    • getWaitlistByUser

      List<Waitlist> getWaitlistByUser(int userId)
      Retrieves all waitlist entries for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique user ID
      Returns:
      a list of slots where the user is waitlisted

    • getWaitlistById

      Waitlist getWaitlistById(int waitlistId)
      Retrieves a single waitlist entry by its ID.
      Parameters:
      waitlistId - the persistent waitlist ID
      Returns:
      the Waitlist object, or null if not found

    • updateWaitlistPosition

      boolean updateWaitlistPosition(int waitlistId, int newPosition)
      Updates the priority position of a user in the waitlist.
      Parameters:
      waitlistId - the persistent waitlist ID
      newPosition - the new zero-based or one-based priority
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful
